
**************************************************************
*            Stride Performance Test Results                 *
**************************************************************

Testing on 10000 array elements each of size 4 bytes with stride 1.
Total array size is 40000 bytes.

Elements in the array are accessed with write/read pairs.
This is done first on element[0], then element [1] and so on.
The entire process is repeated 4 times.

No sum of array elements was maintained. All simulated cache 
traffic was from array accesses.

Total element accesses: 80000  (40000 read and 40000 write)
Total bytes accessed: 320000


==============================================================
          Aggregate Cache and Performance Statistics
==============================================================

Simulated Cache Characteristics:
--------------------------------

Lines=128  Associativity=1 (direct mapped)  Block_size=128
Total cache size is: 16384 bytes

The simulated cache is a "write-back" type: dirty blocks are not written
to memory until evicted, at which time a "write_for_eviction"
is recorded. When a line is written partially, then a
"read_for_write" accounts the need to read the line from
memory before updating it.

Performance Results:
--------------------

Accesses=80000  Hits=78748 (98.4%)
Read Misses=0 (0.0%) Write Misses=1252 (3.1%)  Evictions=1124
Reads=40000  Writes=40000  Reads_for_writes=1252  Writes_for_evictions=1124
Dirty blocks remaining=128

Time for hits=78.75us  Time for memory reads=125.20us
Time for memory writes (including flushing dirties)=162.76us
Estimated total memory access time:   With caching=366.71us   No caching=9.20ms
Speedup: 25.1x


==============================================================
          Contents of individual cache line controls
==============================================================

Tag has 50 bits

Line  Valid   Dirty Tag
    0   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
    1   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
    2   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
    3   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
    4   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
    5   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
    6   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
    7   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
    8   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
    9   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   10   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   11   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   12   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   13   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   14   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   15   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   16   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   17   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   18   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   19   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   20   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   21   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   22   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   23   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   24   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   25   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   26   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   27   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   28   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
   29   VALID DIRTY 00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010
